CustomField.description: Informs the health of the customer based on: + Customer Outcomes (70%) - Deployment (Onboarding completed) 20% - Engagement (Training completed) 10% - Adoption (Character usage) 45% - Character usage 40% - User 5% - ROI captured (5%) - Expansions (20%) + Customer Experience (30%) - Overall Relationship Experience (NPS) 70% - Support Experience (CSAT) 20% - Sentiment (Subjective/Attio) 10%
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Informs the health of the customer based on: + Customer Outcomes (70%) - Deployment (Onboarding completed) 20% - Engagement (Training completed) 10% - Adoption (Character usage) 45% - Character usage 40% - User 5% - ROI captured (5%) - Expansions (20%) + Customer Experience (30%) - Overall Relationship Experience (NPS) 70% - Support Experience (CSAT) 20% - Sentiment (Subjective/Attio) 10%
CustomField.label: Health Score
